about.hero_subtitle: AirKOP is dedicated to revolutionizing access to clean water while empowering communities through sustainable social entrepreneurship.
about.mission_desc: Induk Koperasi Unit Desa (INDUK KUD) is the core force driving rural economic development and improving people's wellbeing in Indonesia. With decades of deep-rooted local development and a nationwide community network, it empowers the sustainable development of rural areas. As a core livelihood project brand under INDUK KUD, AirKOP adheres to the core strategies of technological innovation, community empowerment and commercial sustainability, focusing on the demand for clean drinking water in Indonesian communities and building a high-quality, people-friendly water purification service system. Meanwhile, it takes the project as a carrier to create employment and income-increasing opportunities for community members, realizing the dual values of "inclusive clean water" and "community development", and helping build a healthier and more prosperous social ecosystem in Indonesian rural areas.
about.mission_desc_2: We believe that access to clean water is a fundamental human right, and that local communities are best positioned to manage this resource effectively.
about.value_1_desc: Adhering to strict international standards (ISO9001) to ensure every drop is safe.
about.value_2_desc: Building systems that directly benefit local economies and families.
about.value_3_desc: Leveraging smart technology for efficient water management and distribution.

refund.title: Refund Policy
refund.subtitle: Learn about our refund and cancellation policy
refund.intro: PT INKUD AQUAVISTA SEJAHTERA (AirKOP) is committed to providing quality service. If you encounter problems, we offer the following refund policy.
refund.section1_intro: You may apply for a refund in the following situations:
refund.condition_1_desc: Water station equipment malfunction prevents water dispensing, but payment was deducted
refund.condition_2_desc: Payment successful but account balance not increased
refund.condition_3_desc: Water quality does not meet promised standards (evidence required)
refund.condition_4_desc: System error resulting in duplicate charges
refund.condition_5_desc: Extended service interruption without prior notice
refund.section2_intro: Refunds are not available in the following situations:
refund.non_refund_1: User operation errors (such as selecting wrong recharge amount)
refund.non_refund_2: Water successfully dispensed or service used
refund.non_refund_3: Beyond refund application period (30 days after transaction)
refund.non_refundable_1: Personal preference reasons (e.g., don't like the taste, no longer need)
refund.non_refundable_2: User error (e.g., wrong product selected, wrong amount entered)
refund.non_refundable_3: Refund request made more than 7 days after purchase
refund.non_refundable_5: However, we will evaluate each case individually and may make exceptions in special circumstances
refund.section3_intro: To request a refund, please follow these steps:
refund.step1_1: Submit refund request via customer service phone or email
refund.step1_2: Provide transaction number, time, amount, and problem description
refund.step1_3: Provide photo or video evidence if necessary
refund.step2_1: We will review your request within 3 business days
refund.step2_3: Review results will be notified via email or SMS
refund.step3_1: After approval, refund will be processed within 5-7 business days
refund.step3_2: Refund will be returned to original payment method
refund.step3_3: You will receive refund confirmation notification
refund.timeline_3_desc: Usually 7-10 business days for complete process
refund.section5_intro: In certain situations, we may offer partial refunds:
refund.partial_1: Service partially completed but quality not up to standard
refund.partial_2: Equipment malfunction but partial water amount obtained
refund.partial_3: Refund amount determined through negotiation based on actual situation
refund.section6_intro: To request a refund or inquire, please contact:
refund.section7_intro: If you are not satisfied with the refund decision:
refund.dispute_1: You may request a review by a senior supervisor
refund.dispute_2: We will provide a final response within 5 business days
refund.dispute_3: If disputes remain, you may seek assistance from consumer protection agencies
